ISSUE.TITLE: Column with checkbox type may not be updated for consecutive clicks
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Create a project 2. Create a table 3. Create a column with checkbox type 4. Input multiple records, says 10 records 5. Tick all the record one by one as fast as you could 6. The UI is updated but some may be not ticked after clicking review Basically it's fine only If I click it, wait for the message box popping out, then click the next one. If I click them quickly, some may be not updated. **Expected behavior** The checkbox values can be updated even I click them fast.
